Uses of Interface
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime

Packages that use Regime
Package
Description
net.tvburger.jdl.knn
Provides the implementation of k-Nearest Neighbors
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training
Defines the concepts related for training an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes
Provides the different regimes for training

  • Uses of Regime in net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes

    Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes that implement Regime
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    final class 
    BatchRegime
    A Regime implementation that performs full-batch training.
    class 
    ChainedRegime
    Composes and executes a chain of Regime decorators.
    static final class 
    ChainedRegime.BottomUpChainer
    Fluent builder that composes the chain from bottom up.
    protected static class 
    ChainedRegime.Modifiable<M extends ChainedRegime.Modifiable<M>>
    Abstract base for creating fluent builders of ChainedRegime.
    static final class 
    ChainedRegime.TopDownChainer
    Fluent builder that composes the chain from top down.
    class 
    DelegatedRegime
    An abstract Regime implementation that delegates all training to another Regime.
    class 
    DumpNodesRegime
    A Regime decorator that dumps the internal node activations of a NeuralNetwork before and/or after each training epoch.
    final class 
    EpochRegime
    A Regime decorator that repeats training for a fixed number of epochs.
    final class 
    MiniBatchRegime
    A Regime decorator that performs training using mini-batches.
    class 
    ObjectiveReportingRegime
    A Regime decorator that wraps another training regime and reports the objective (loss) value at each epoch.
    final class 
    OnlineRegime
    A Regime decorator that performs online training (also known as stochastic training).
    class 
    StopIfNoImprovementRegime
    A Regime decorator that implements early stopping based on lack of improvement in the objective (loss).
